description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ct9n1","text":"This protocol describes single cell passaging of hPSC using enzymatic dissociation reagents. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3rf7i","text":"The protocol is adaptable to different enzyme-free reagents described in Materials section and various vessel formats.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

material","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7u7q","text":"1/5/10 mL pipettes status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"au7as","text":"Transfer hPSC suspension to a 15 or 50 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aovvl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ukm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7sib3","text":"Several wells or vessels can be combined for centrifugation step. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aejqu","text":"Add enzymatic dissociation reagent, refer to Table 1 for recommended working volumes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlket","text":"Add hPSC media supplemented with survival factors to the wells containing dissociation reagent, refer to Table 1 for recommended harvesting volumes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":105,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"655ip","text":"Incubate the vessel at   for   -   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d1o39","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e4u7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5DE7C4C0F38B11EF821F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5DE7C55DF38B11EF821F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"5DE7C5E3F38B11EF821F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3di3n","text":"Incubation time depends on reagent used, coating and hPSC line attachment properties. Therefore, monitoring under microscope every 2-3 min until hPSC detachment observation is recommended.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d0o2g","text":"If necessary, gently tap culture vessel from the side to detach hPSC.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vrk7","text":"Pipette up and down several times to dislodge the cells from the culture surface. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em4in","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mqu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f30mu","text":"Pipette selection for this step depends on total hPSC suspension volume. The smaller the tip of the pipette the better cells will be singularized.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euc3p","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant without disrupting the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68vj9","text":"Resuspend cell pellet in hPSC media supplemented with survival factors. Resuspension volume will depend on pellet size in a range of 1-10 mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rnb0","text":"Perform hPSC counting using viability staining such as Trypan Blue 0.4%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af8kp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"falkm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"emhvi","text":"Counting can be performed manually using e.g. Neubauer Chamber or automated cell counting devices.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uusu","text":"Adjust hPSC suspension volume according to desired number of cells for seeding, refer to Table 1 for recommended final media volumes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pnui","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2nmqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1j0lj","text":"As example, for hPSC single cell passaging for hPSC maintenance in 6 well-plates, we recommend a seeding density between 200,000-400,000 cells per well. Seeding densities have to be tested and adjusted per hPSC line for optimal passaging.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"889qn","text":"Pipette cell suspension into the coated recipient wells according to desired hPSC seeding density, refer to Table 1 for recommended final media volumes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":108,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dr7e","text":"Gently move destination vessels with hPSC in suspension in cross shape to distribute them evenly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rkqi","text":"After  , perform full media change with respective hPSC maintenance media without survival factors.  For further hPSC culture refer to protocol Maintenance of hPSC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"dboge","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fj7uh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u2ln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"B225E509F38B11EF975D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C2D3A3BA22E49EC9A7659A77E8B6BA7","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/maintenance-of-hpsc-c434yyqw"}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8q4e7","text":"hPSC display different morphology when cultured in medium containing survival factors. This morphology will change after media is replaced with medium without survival factors. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":57,"offset":43}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"au89t","text":"For detailed morphology, refer to protocol Reference pictures of hPSC cultured in defined conditions","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"D41476748E1D41059DBBA29DEAD8B47B","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/reference-pictures-of-hpsc-cultured-in-defined-con-c5c5y2y6"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}
